stories.headline: Marco Rubio wants to build a ‘new Western century’. Will Europe join?
stories.description: Europe is facing a great dilemma: continue with liberalist values or embrace Trump’s defence of ‘Western civilisation’?

stories.headline: Trump's new world order is real and Europe is having to adjust fast
stories.description: European nations are asking whether traditional alliances can suffice, or whether they should be diversifying

stories.headline: Rubio in Hungary for signing of US-Hungarian civilian nuclear pact
stories.description: US and Hungary sign civilian nuclear cooperation deal in Budapest.

stories.headline: ByteDance pledges fixes to Seedance 2.0 after Hollywood copyright claims
stories.description: Hollywood groups say the AI video generator uses the likeness of actors and others without permission.

stories.headline: Iran’s Araghchi arrives in Geneva for second round of nuclear talks with US
stories.description: Iran’s top diplomat says he will meet with IAEA director before the high-stakes talks with US are held on Tuesday.
